import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-intro', templateUrl: './intro.component.html', styleUrls: ['./intro.component.css'] }) export class IntroComponent { }

SUCCESS

ًWhy ArtHouse?

Welcome to our website, where you can effortlessly book tickets for cinema, theater, and music events. Whether you're a fan of captivating films, awe-inspiring performances, or soul-stirring melodies, our platform offers a seamless and convenient way to secure your spot in the world of entertainment. Browse through an array of options, select your preferred showtime, and get ready to immerse yourself in unforgettable moments. Start your journey with us and let the enchantment begin!
